welcome:
## Welcome to Pedro's Website Agent!
### Hey there, I’m Indy 🤖

I’m an AI digital assistant here to help you explore all things about Pedro’s professional life. Feel free to ask me about:
- Curriculum & Skills 📚💡
- Working Experience 🏢💼
- Certificates & Credentials 📜🏅
- Booking Appointments 🗓️✅

---

Disclaimer:
While I strive to provide accurate responses, my answers may not be 100% correct. I’m continuously learning and improving to serve you better.

Enjoy your visit, and let me know how I can help!
